name: Zero Point (itch) (jfeelgood) (jfeelgood)
description:
Music and Game by #JFeelgood of www.jfeelgood.com

Voice of Helavandaro : #JFeelgood

Voice of Captain Joshua Snapp : Joshua Snapp

Special thanks to Game Testers: Xtal, @Cycloptoad (Justin Hanrahan), Sam Ray, Joshua Snapp, Jude Stippick, Zeekee Zaragoza, Ellen Falterman, Stuart Robinson, Geneva Snapp, James Snapp, Jorge Aguilar

I began exploring video game design in September 2020 with GDevelop knowing nothing about how they were made. Ready for public debut four months later, on Jan 4th 2021, here is my first ever video game.

Please feel free to comment with constructive feedback.
